tune
part of tidymodels 0.0.0.9000
  • Articles
    • Bayesian Optimization of Classification Model
    • Acquisition Functions
    • Grid Search
  • Reference
  • News

The goal of tune is to faciltate the tuning of hyperparameters the tidymodels packages.

Installation

You can install the released version of tune from CRAN with:

install.packages("tune")

License

  • GPL-2

Developers

    Author, maintainer
  • All authors...

Dev status

tune is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.

Developed by Max Kuhn. Site built by pkgdown.
